channel.title: Home Page on Tech with Safi
channel.description: Recent content in Home Page on Tech with Safi

item.title: Virtualization in old x86 CPUs
item.description: We all know that modern x86 CPUs can do hardware virtualization but do you know a form of virtualization has existed in all x86 CPUs since the 1980s?

item.title: How to turn your older Raspberry Pi into a BitTorrent Home Media Sever
item.description: How to turn your Raspberry Pi 0/1 into a BitTorrent Client Home Media Server with qBittorrent and MiniDLNA(Now ReadyMedia).

item.title: One of my favorite FOSS game Scorched 3D
item.description: Scorched 3D is a turn-based 3D artillery game inspired by the old MS-DOS title of Scorched Earth. The game is an extremely addictive game.

item.title: How to run SuperTuxKart properly on your Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye
item.description: How to run SuperTux Kart properly without the missing graphics on Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye (64-bit) running on Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 400.

item.title: How to control the keyboard and mouse of your compute remotely via SSH
item.description: How to control the keyboard and mouse of your Linux machine remotely via x2x and SSH

item.title: How to make Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye more useful
item.description: Raspberry Pi OS is great for beginners but it is rather limited as a desktop OS. I will explain how to turn it into a more standard Linux distro.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Safi. My blog is about free and open-source software, Linux and other Unix-Like operating systems like the BSDs, single board computers like the Raspberry Pi and retro computing and retro gaming.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel Free to contact me both via my email address and via my social media accounts. My email address is safiuddinkhan@gmail.com Social Media Accounts My LinkedIn Account is https://www.linkedin.com/in/safi-ud-din-khan-b752ab13a/
